course_description: This is a required course in the Econometrics core sequence.  Topics include general linear models, specification analysis, testing and model evaluation, endogeneity and IV methods, and forecasting.
sections: Class Nbr: 2431, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: D. Jacho-Chavez, Status: Open
